title: Spiced pumpkin cheesecake bars
ingredients: ['450g sponge cake mix', '3 eggs', '30g unsalted butter, melted', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice or ground cloves', '225g cream cheese, softened', '1 (397g) tin sweetened condensed milk', '425g pumpkin puree', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '120g chopped pecans']
